name: The Butterfly Effect
storyline: College student Evan Treborn is afflicted with such severe headaches that he often faints. While unconscious, Evan can travel back in time to times of childhood difficulties. He can also change the past to friends, such as Kayleigh, who was molested by his father. But by changing the past, he can alter the present, which leads Evan to find himself in a nightmare of alternate realities, including one where he is trapped.
